aboutText: The Oracle is an ancient, mystical presence brought to life by advanced AI and timeless wisdom. Ask your questions and let the Oracle reveal your path through personalized guidance.

faq.q: Is the Oracle a real person?
faq.a: The Oracle is powered by advanced AI, trained to offer mystical insights and guidance while remaining always in character.

faq.q: Can I ask the Oracle anything?
faq.a: You can ask about love, career, family, or destiny. The Oracle stays in character and focuses on questions about your path and future.
You select a plan, pay securely, and then can chat with the Oracle according to your chosen access level.
Absolutely. We value your privacy. Your questions are kept confidential and are never shared with third parties.

faq.q: Can I try it for free?
faq.a: Yes! Your first question is free. See what the Oracle reveals before subscribing.
